summary: In telecommunications and signal processing, frequency modulation transmits information over a carrier wave by varying the frequency.
full_text: FM broadcasting is a VHF broadcasting technology, pioneered by Edwin Howard Armstrong, which uses frequency modulation  to provide high-fidelity sound over broadcast radio. The term "FM band" describes the frequency band in a given country which is dedicated to FM broadcasting. This term is slightly misleading, as it equates a modulation method with a range of frequencies.
title: FM radio
